parameters.name: Radius
parameters.description: Radius of the fillet in meters

parameters.name: ConstrainedCorners
parameters.description: Action to take as defined in swConstrainedCornerAction_e (see Remarks )

title: ISketchManager.CreateFillet
description: Creates a sketch fillet using the selected sketch entities.
signature:
SketchSegment CreateFillet( 
   System.Double
Radius
,
   System.Int32
ConstrainedCorners
)

parameters.name: Radius
parameters.description: Radius of the fillet in meters

parameters.name: ConstrainedCorners
parameters.description: Action to take as defined in swConstrainedCornerAction_e (see Remarks )

remarks: The ConstrainedCorners parameter indicates what action to take if the corner to fillet is constrained or dimensioned. If the corner is not constrained or dimensioned, then this parameter is ignored.
